description: a function that generates business mails

completionConfig.label: gpt-4
completionConfig.chatSystemMessage: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information.

variables.value: I'll work on the Unicorn Project tomorrow at 3 PM

output.prompt:
Rewrite the text between triple backticks into a business mail. Use a professional tone. 
If the mail includes any information about date and time, highlight them in bold using the <strong> tag. 
Sign the mail as AI Assistant. Generate the output as HTML.

Text: ```I'll work on the Unicorn Project tomorrow at 3 PM```
output.result:
Dear Sir/Madam,

I am writing to inform you that I will be dedicating my time and efforts towards the Unicorn Project. The work is scheduled to commence tomorrow at 3 PM.

I am confident that my involvement will contribute significantly to the progress of the project. I look forward to your support and cooperation in this endeavor.

Best Regards,

AI Assistant
output.chatCompletionResult:
Dear Sir/Madam,

I am writing to inform you that I will be dedicating my time and efforts towards the Unicorn Project. The work is scheduled to commence tomorrow at 3 PM.

I am confident that my involvement will contribute significantly to the progress of the project. I look forward to your support and cooperation in this endeavor.

Best Regards,

AI Assistant
